# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

project(BinaryTreeOperations)

# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_PATH "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/BinaryTreeOperations")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
#}}}}

include_directories(
    .
    .
    classes
    ../BinaryTreeConstruction/include
    ../BinaryTreeConstruction/src

)


# Compiler options
add_definitions(-g)
add_definitions(-O0)
add_definitions(-std=c++14)
add_definitions(-Wall)
add_definitions(-Wextra)
add_definitions(
    -DDEBUG
)


# Linker options
set(LINK_OPTIONS psapi)


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
set(CMAKE_LDFLAGS "${CMAKE_LDFLAGS} -L. ")

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/BinaryTreeOperations/main.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/BinaryTreeOperations/classes/BinaryTreeOperations.cpp
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -g -O0 -std=c++14 -Wall -Wextra")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_executable(BinaryTreeOperations ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(BinaryTreeOperations ${LINK_OPTIONS})



#{{{{ User Code 3
# Place your code here
#}}}}
